name: HelicopterRevival
title: HelicopterRevival
author: Kumpu, blueh00f, twilightthepony, HR contribs
description: Adds a fully animated attack helicopter to the game. Ideal for getting from A to B quickly, exploring the map, building islands and nuking biters from the sky. Now 84% less buggier! Forked from Kumpu for updates beyond Factorio 0.17.
